title: mise rc config
description: Early initialization settings for mise. These settings are loaded before the main config files.

ceiling_paths.description: Directories where mise stops searching for config files.

env.description: Env to use for mise.<MISE_ENV>.toml files.

ignored_config_paths.description: This is a list of config paths that mise will ignore.

override_config_filenames.description: If set, mise will ignore default config files like `mise.toml` and use these filenames instead.

override_tool_versions_filenames.description: If set, mise will ignore .tool-versions files and use these filenames instead. Can be set to `none` to disable .tool-versions.
